summary: Eager to work ina fast-paced customer focusedA environment driven to expand sales volume by utilizing developing technology. Proficient at understanding client needs and collaborating on a creative vision to exceed expectations and deliver results conducive to cultivating relationships and growing business.
work_experience: This individual served as a Personal Stylist- Women's Designer from 05/2014 to 02/2017, where they leveraged design knowledge to create personalized experiences, managed client consultations, and utilized digital tools and communication templates to improve customer retention and achieve significant designer selling volume. Prior to this, as a Saks Associate from 02/2010 to 05/2014, they relocated personal clientele, developed business in an elevated women's designer department, maximized sales volume, and attended product knowledge seminars. From 06/2006 to 02/2010, also as a Saks Associate, they assisted customers in choosing outfits, developed relationships, increased sales volume through suggestions, and adapted numeracy skills for transactions. Earlier, as a Team Member from 08/2004 to 06/2006, they delivered friendly service, managed stock levels, maintained company integrity, and performed as a training mentor and shift lead during critical times.
